title: List of lord mayors of Copenhagen
text:
The lord mayor of Copenhagen () is the <a href="Copenhagen">city</a>'s mayor and the leader of the <a href="Copenhagen%20City%20Council">Copenhagen City Council</a>. Established in 1938, all <a href="Lord%20mayor">lord mayors</a> have since belonged to the <a href="Social%20Democrats%20%28Denmark%29">Social Democratic Party</a>.
Current mayors.
As of the <a href="Municipalities%20of%20Denmark">municipal</a> <a href="election">election</a>s of November 19, 2013, Copenhagen has the following <a href="mayor">mayor</a>s:
